inputs.name: alias
inputs.label: Applicaton Alias
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application alias. Names must not contain spaces and must be unique to the platform.

inputs.name: retainScalingSettings
inputs.label: Retain Instance Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want to keep the published instance's scaling definition instead of the Platform Default

inputs.name: versionAlias
inputs.label: Version Alias
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the version alias whose Stage is to be updated..

inputs.name: stage
inputs.label: Target Deployment Stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the desired stage of deployment. Values can be either definition, sandbox, or published.

inputs.name: cloudurl
inputs.label: Apprenda Cloud URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the base cloud URL that is used to connect to ACP.

inputs.name: ignoreCertificateValidation
inputs.label: Ignore Certificate Validation Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if certificate validation errors should be ignored, for example if your Apprenda Cloud Platform instance uses a self-signed certificate.

inputs.name: clouduser
inputs.label: Apprenda Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the username that is used to connect to ACP.

inputs.name: cloudpw
inputs.label: Apprenda Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the password that is used to connect to ACP.

inputs.name: clouddevteam
inputs.label: Apprenda Development Team
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the development team alias that is used to connect to ACP.

description: This task promotes your application to the next stage on ACP.
author: Apprenda
helpMarkDown: This task will promote an application version to its next stage in the [Apprenda Lifecycle Model](http://docs.apprenda.com/6-5/promotion-redesign)
name: ApprendaPromote
